supportUs.text1: You can support the Angelbotics team through our 501(c)(3) Friends of Angelbotics! Please go to
supportUs.text2: for current ways to support, donate through the links below, or share the Angelbotics story on social media. We have a P.O. box at PO Box 300023, Denver, CO 80203 and you can contact us any time at

joinInfo.text: Are you interested in joining Angelbotics? Follow the steps below. For more questions please email mentors@angelbotics.org

steps.name: Form
steps.text: Fill out the application form and join our discord linked at the end

steps.name: Meeting
steps.text: Come to a meeting in butler 3!

resourceCards.name: Github
resourceCards.description: We make all of our code publicly visible on GitHub, including the code for this website! Our team believes in sharing as much as possible to help other FRC teams succeed. You can find the latest version of any code we have on our GitHub Organization page.

resourceCards.name: Onshape
resourceCards.description: Angelbotics uses Onshape to CAD our robots, because it is online, collaborative and free for students and educators. You can view our 2024 robot cad here!

resourceCards.name: The Blue Alliance
resourceCards.description: The Blue Alliance is a website that gives you access a data for FIRST. You can find information including the dates of competitions, the match schedule, and recent team rankings, alongside statistics and other information about individual teams and matches.

resourceCards.name: Gitbook
resourceCards.description: Gitbook is a hub angelbotics uses for all our training material, to help our new students learn.

resourceCards.name: Chief Delphi Forums
resourceCards.description: Chief Delphi functions as the main forum for all things FIRST related. News from FIRST themselves and many other major contributors is usually posted on Chief Delphi. It's also a place for teams to find solutions for their problems, post questions if needed, and participate in discussions surrounding all things FIRST.
